channel.description: Recent content in Supabase-Blog on Daily Tech Articles Feed

item.title: Supabase Launch Week 15 Hackathon Winner Announcement
item.description: 🚀 Supabase Launch Week 15 has concluded, and we are excited to announce the winners of our Hackathon! The event showcased remarkable innovation from participants, demonstrating their technical skills. The standout project, “Figma AI Tickets” by vickywane, is a plugin that converts design tasks into actionable user stories using OpenAI’s GPT-4. Congratulations to all participants for their impressive submissions! 👏 #Supabase #Hackathon #Innovation #Figma #GPT4

item.title: Supabase Auth: Build vs. Buy
item.description: 🔍 Understanding authentication is key for developers. While it’s essential in almost every app, it’s often not the main focus. Supabase Auth provides a ready-made solution, integrating directly with your Postgres database. It offers JWT-based security and seamless Row Level Security integration. Building your own authentication can lead to hidden costs, such as time and maintenance, which can divert resources from core development. Consider your options carefully! 🔒💻 #Supabase #Authentication…
